name: fail-up

scripts.build: npm run build:cjs && npm run build:esm
scripts.build:cjs: npx tsc --module commonjs --outDir dist/cjs/ && echo {"type": "commonjs"} > dist/cjs/package.json
scripts.build:esm: npx tsc --module es2022 --outDir dist/esm/ && echo {"type": "module"} > dist/cjs/package.json

author: JoueBien
description: A Go like error system for TypeScript.
